attributes.action: Stop paying council tax if EU referendum result isn't acknowledged and upheld
attributes.background: Many Senior MPs and Holyrood are planning to block an EU Brexit,this is counter democratic and not dissimilar behaviour than that of a spoilt child who didn't get their own way.The vote has proven a majority decision,and if a second referendum is held.All leavers should stop paying their council tax

rejection.details: This doesn't call for action from the UK Government or Parliament.
